document_data.caption:
Screenshot of Fll'Yissetat as she appears in the
''[[Baldur's Gate II: Throne of Bhaal]]'' video game.
document_data.name: Fll'Yissetat
document_data.mainbody: '''Fll'Yissetat''' was a fairly powerful female [[green dragon]] who acted as an unwilling guardian for [[Abazigal]]'s lair, having been [[geas|geased]] into service. The key to unlocking the geas was a [[scroll of reversal]] kept in the desk of [[Iycanth]].
document_data.Possessions: The green dragon owned Abazigal's wardstone and an enchanted trinket called [[The Specter's Ring]].
document_data.History: [[Gorion's Ward]] reached the dragon's chamber, and noticed that within her eyes, was a great suffering, as if she was in unfathomable pain. Fll'Yissetat recognised the ward as a [[Bhaalspawn]], and asked to be freed. In order to reach Abazigal, had to either release Fll'Yissetat, in which case she left, or fight her. Either way, she wished for the ward to kill the "mongrel half-breed" that kept her geased for so long.
